name: Shai Gecelter
headLine: Draw a logo for your website and animate it by tomorrow.
description: I'm a pro photographer who lives in Florence, Italy I am an excellent 3D Animator and I am looking for an opportunity to work. I have a great academic background in 3D Animation and my experience compliments my studies. Throughout my career I have been working as a 3D Animator and as a 3D Modelling Designer. I also have experience working with 3D Rendering and 3ds Max. I look forward to working on your projects.
moreDescription: I am an excellent 3D Animator and I am looking for an opportunity to work. I have a great academic background in 3D Animation and my experience compliments my studies. Throughout my career I have been working as a 3D Animator and as a 3D Modelling Designer. I also have experience working with 3D Rendering and 3ds Max. I look forward to working on your projects.
checkPoint: After 5 hours i will send you a draft sketch
avalability: I'm working on Sunday, Monady and Friday
instructions: I need a picture of you and the kids
